pr_title: Have DirectoryToBagJob produce works instead of folders

timeline.message: Have DirectoryToBagJob produce works instead of folders
Add test to verify that nested directories work in directory deposit job

timeline.bodyText: Seems like you can undo this change since we don't want to generate DirectoryToBag deposits are being inside of one giant work
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, this isn't the right outcome, there should be the same number of immediate children as before, the difference is the child should be a work, and that work should contain the file
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText:
This is just occurring to me now, but it'd make sense to refactor getFileResource to generate a work which wraps the file. That way it continues to be useful, the Bagit job also gets to benefit from this change, and you wouldn't have to make much (or any) changes to the behavior here.
So you would basically want to move all this work construction and wrapping into getFileResource, which should already correctly be handling adding to the right parent folder.
timeline.author: bbpennel
